titleStmt.title: The loyall sacrifice presented in the lives and deaths of those two eminent-heroick patternes, for valour, discipline, and fidelity; the generally beloved and bemoaned, Sir Charls Lucas, and Sir George Lisle, knights. Being both shot to death at Colchester, five houres after the surrender.
titleStmt.author: Philocrates.

notesStmt.note: The words "Sir Charls .. Lisle," are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
